Q

Query - class jpo.Query.
This class stores the parameters for a search and can return an Arraylist of the search results.
Query(String) - Constructor for class jpo.Query
Constructor to create a new Query object.
QueryJFrame - class jpo.QueryJFrame.
QueryJFrame.java: creates a GUI to allow the user to specify his search
QueryJFrame(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode, CleverJTree, ThumbnailJScrollPane) - Constructor for class jpo.QueryJFrame
Creates a GUI to specify the search criteria.
QueryJFrame.QueryThread - class jpo.QueryJFrame.QueryThread.
This allows the search to be run in it's own thread
QueryJFrame.QueryThread() - Constructor for class jpo.QueryJFrame.QueryThread
Constructor for the thread
queueIcon - Static variable in class jpo.ThumbnailCreationQueue
An icon that indicates an image on the queue
